./VulnDB/RDBO/MessageType.pm

  • package VulnDB::RDBO::MessageType
  • EOF
   1 package VulnDB::RDBO::MessageType;
   2 
   3 use strict;
   4 
   5 use base qw(VulnDB::RDBO);
   6 
   7 __PACKAGE__->meta->setup(
   8     table   => 'message_type',
   9 
  10     columns => [
  11         id   => { type => 'integer', not_null => 1 },
  12         name => { type => 'varchar', default => '', length => 25, not_null => 1 },
  13         desc => { type => 'scalar', default => '', length => 4294967295, not_null => 1 },
  14     ],
  15 
  16     primary_key_columns => [ 'id' ],
  17 
  18     unique_key => [ 'name' ],
  19 
  20     relationships => [
  21         message => {
  22             class      => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Message',
  23             column_map => { id => 'message_type_id' },
  24             type       => 'one to many',
  25         },
  26 
  27         source => {
  28             class      => 'VulnDB::RDBO::Source',
  29             column_map => { id => 'message_type_id' },
  30             type       => 'one to many',
  31         },
  32     ],
  33 );
  34 
  35 1;
